plots_path.description: 新生成plots的路径 | new plots location.

plots_path_target.description: 需要替换的plots路径，plots_check.csv的评分文件也应当放在此目录中 | replace target location, plots_check.csv should also be placed in this location.

ratio.description: 新生成的plots评分，低于该评分将删除并重新绘图 | ratio of new plots, lower than it will be deleted and replot.

ratio_target.description: 将要替换的plots的评分，低于该评分的将会被替换 | ratio of be replaced plots, lower than it will be replaced.
